Summary Note:
Rossi Silvestri Donati and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Rome. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Rossi Silvestri Donati is a 65 year old and comes from Italy.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Rossi Silvestri Donati is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Rossi finished secondary school at Istituto Tecnico Industriale Statale Enrico Mattei Roma in 1978.
He then attended University of Milan, which he graduated in 1982.
Occupation History:
Rossi Silvestri Donati is a 65 year old retired Private Equity Investor from Italy. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Rossi Silvestri Donati began his professional journey as a Investment Banker at UBM S.p.A. in 1984, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Private Equity Investor at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. in 1991, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 570000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Perugia, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
